title: Client and Server Mismatch
body:
So first champ select i queue up for, what do you know league freezes right?
Now I get past champ select and oh what do you know.... client mismatch.
Any fixes?
If it helps it said client mismatch (Client 6.23 / Server 6.24) something like that.
And after re-tries it says you have been disconnected.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you still experiencing this issue? [Running a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) should resolve this.
I have same problem idk what to do..

Same thing is happening to me aswell, I'm trying a full repair to see if that forces the client to update to the new patch since it looks like beta client is having trouble getting the update out. I'll update you when it's done.
Okay, I've found a fix, just jump over to the legacy client and the client will update to 6.24. The repair did jack snap... waste of 20 minutes...
